name: Santa Rider
description:
***Come and play with Santa***
You will love playing this Santa's Riding game...
This Game is based around an exciting, interactive Santa Clause character...
Who is Stepping on the journey of collecting gifts for the Christmas!!!
You are to help Santa...
You must not miss a single Gift...
Because Santa Cares for each kid Personally!!!

SoO... let's start now!!!
Download this endless entertaining game and enjoy the Ride with Santa!!!

FEATURES!!!
-Beautiful Santa Characters
-ExtraOrdinary Addictive GamePlay
-Most JoyFull Game Sound
-Awsome Graphics and Artworks!
-Hours of Endless GamePlay!
